parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="bsr_block">
    <attribute name="bsr_blockid" />
    <attribute name="bsr_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="bsr_usrn" />
    <attribute name="bsr_uprn" />
    <attribute name="bsr_postcode" />
    <order attribute="bsr_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="bsr_postcode" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>
